summary: Iteration 8 - Admin Panel Separation complete. All 12 backend tests passed. UI verified: separate admin panel at /backman with dark theme, user site cleaned (no admin features), default language changed to English.

issues: Recharts console warnings about chart width/height - cosmetic only (existing)

passed_tests: Backend: POST /api/admin/login with admin credentials returns 200 + token
Backend: POST /api/admin/login rejects staff users (403 Admin access only)
Backend: POST /api/admin/login rejects wrong password (401)
Backend: POST /api/admin/login rejects non-existent email (401)
Backend: POST /api/auth/login works for staff users
Backend: POST /api/auth/login works for admin via regular endpoint
Backend: GET /api/users with admin token returns user list
Backend: GET /api/users with staff token returns 403
Backend: GET /api/dashboard/stats works with admin token
Backend: Both admin and staff tokens validated via /api/auth/me
Backend: test@test.com admin login works
Backend: test@test.com works via /api/admin/login
UI: User login page shows English by default (Login, not लॉगिन)
UI: User login page has NO Register tab
UI: User login page shows 'Contact admin for login credentials' message
UI: Staff login (newstaff@dairy.com) redirects to dashboard
UI: User site sidebar has NO 'Users' admin link
UI: Admin login page at /backman/login has dark theme
UI: Admin login with nirbanidairy@gmal.com works
UI: Admin dashboard shows stats (Total Users, Active Users, Farmers, etc.)
UI: Admin User Management page shows all users with role badges
UI: Admin panel shows Add User, toggle active, reset password, delete buttons
UI: Admin panel shows 'You' label for current user
UI: /backman without admin_token redirects to /backman/login
UI: Language toggle button visible in user site sidebar
critical_code_review_comments: All admin panel features implemented correctly
Separate admin login endpoint POST /api/admin/login enforces role=admin check
Admin panel uses admin_token (localStorage) separate from user site auth_token
Default language correctly set to 'en' in AuthContext.js
User site MainLayout.jsx has no Users nav item (admin-only feature in /backman)
Admin panel has dark zinc theme with amber accent colors
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_admin_panel_v8.py - New test file for admin panel separation
seed_data_creation: Admin user nirbanidairy@gmal.com seeded by backend on startup
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin panel at /backman is fully separate from user site. Uses admin_token in localStorage. Dark theme with amber accents. User site uses auth_token. Test IDs: admin-login-email, admin-login-password, admin-login-submit, admin-nav-dashboard, admin-nav-users, admin-logout, admin-stats-grid, add-user-btn, user-{id}, toggle-user-{id}, reset-pwd-{id}, delete-user-{id}. User site login: login-email, login-password, login-submit. Language toggle: desktop-language-toggle, mobile-language-toggle.

admin_panel_separation.dark_theme: ✓ Admin panel has zinc-950 background with amber accents

user_site_cleaned.no_register: ✓ Login page has no Register tab
user_site_cleaned.no_admin_links: ✓ Sidebar has no Users or admin links
